SELECT BANNER_SEQ_NO AS bannerSeqNo ,BANNER_NM AS bannerNm ,BANNER_DC AS bannerDc ,BANNER_URL AS bannerUrl ,ATCH_FILE_ID AS atchFileId ,DATE_FORMAT(BANNER_BGNDE, '%Y-%m-%d') AS bannerBgnde ,DATE_FORMAT(BANNER_ENDDE, '%Y-%m-%d') AS bannerEndde ,BANNER_ORDR AS bannerOrdr ,BANNER_TY AS bannerTy
,CASE WHEN DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d') > DATE_FORMAT(BANNER_ENDDE, '%Y-%m-%d') THEN 'N' WHEN DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d') < DATE_FORMAT(BANNER_BGNDE, '%Y-%m-%d') THEN 'P' ELSE 'U' END AS bannerPdCheck FROM T_BANNER_M01 WHERE DELETE_AT = 'N'
AND BANNER_NM LIKE CONCAT('%' , #{searchKeyword}, '%')
AND BANNER_TY = #{bannerTy}
AND USE_AT = #{useAt}
AND DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d') BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(BANNER_BGNDE, '%Y-%m-%d') AND DATE_FORMAT(BANNER_ENDDE, '%Y-%m-%d')
ORDER BY BANNER_ORDR ASC
ORDER BY REGIST_DE DESC

SELECT BANNER_SEQ_NO AS bannerSeqNo ,BANNER_NM AS bannerNm ,BANNER_DC AS bannerDc ,BANNER_URL AS bannerUrl ,ATCH_FILE_ID AS atchFileId ,DATE_FORMAT(BANNER_BGNDE, '%Y-%m-%d') AS bannerBgnde ,DATE_FORMAT(BANNER_ENDDE, '%Y-%m-%d') AS bannerEndde ,BANNER_ORDR AS bannerOrdr ,BANNER_TY AS bannerTy
FROM T_BANNER_M01 WHERE DELETE_AT = 'N' AND BANNER_SEQ_NO = #{bannerSeqNo}
